name: 林顯易
objective: 先修課程：負責教授同意。工程最佳化方法導論、線性規劃法、非線性規劃法、多目標函數最佳化、近代數學規劃法介紹、精密機電元件與系統之最佳設計。
schedule:
Week1 (2/21): Introduction
Week2 (2/28): Holiday
Week3 (3/7)：Basic math review
Week4 (3/14) ：Basics of optimization problems
Week5 (3/21) ：One-dimension search
Week6 (3/28) ：Newton’s method
Week7 (4/4) ： Holiday
Week8 (4/11) ：Gradient methods
Week9 (4/18) ：Mid-term exam
Week10 (4/25) ： Least square method
Week11 (5/2) ： Genetic algorithm 
Week12 (5/9) ：Neural network
Week13 (5/16) ：Linear programming
Week14 (5/23) ：Simplex method
Week15 (5/30) ：Lagrange multiplier 
Week16 (6/6) ：Convex optimization 
Week17 (6/13) ：Particle swarm optimization 
Week18 (6/20) ：Final exam
materials: 教課書: Edwin K. P. Chong and Stanislaw H. Zak, “An Introduction to Optimization,” Second Edition, Wiley-Interscience, New York, NY, 2001, ISBN: 0-471-39126-3.
